statements: SELECT * FROM stock_availability WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM stock_availability ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC
SELECT warehouse_location FROM stock_availability WHERE warehouse_id = 2
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM stock_availability WHERE stock_quantity > 100
SELECT DISTINCT warehouse_id, warehouse_location FROM stock_availability
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM stock_availability WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT SUM(stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM stock_availability GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING total_stock > 500
SELECT * FROM stock_availability WHERE warehouse_location = 'New York' OR warehouse_location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT product_name, warehouse_location FROM stock_availability WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT warehouse_id) AS total_warehouses FROM stock_availability
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT location, capacity FROM warehouses;
SELECT * FROM stock_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name FROM stock_items WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT location, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM stock_items WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM stock_items GROUP BY warehouse_id
SELECT w.location, s.item_name, s.quantity FROM warehouses w JOIN stock_items s ON w.warehouse_id = s.warehouse_id
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_id FROM warehouses;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM stock WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM stock GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY category DESC;

SELECT warehouse_name, product_name, quantity FROM warehouses w JOIN stock s ON w.warehouse_id = s.warehouse_id JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC, product_name;

SELECT p.product_name, w.warehouse_name, s.quantity, p.unit_price FROM products p JOIN stock s ON p.product_id = s.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY p.unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price * quantity AS total_price FROM products p JOIN stock s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE warehouse_id = 2 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN stock ON products.product_id = stock.product_id;
SELECT warehouse_name, view_name FROM views JOIN warehouses ON views.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE warehouse_id = 1;

SELECT view_name, product_name, quantity FROM views JOIN products ON views.product_id = products.product_id JOIN stock ON views.product_id = stock.product_id AND views.warehouse_id = stock.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN stock ON products.product_id = stock.product_id;
SELECT warehouse_name, product_name, quantity FROM warehouses JOIN products ON warehouses.warehouse_id = products.warehouse_id JOIN stock ON products.product_id = stock.product_id;
SELECT view_id, view_name, product_name, quantity FROM views JOIN products ON views.product_id = products.product_id JOIN stock ON views.product_id = stock.product_id;

SELECT warehouse_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouses JOIN products ON warehouses.warehouse_id = products.warehouse_id JOIN stock ON products.product_id = stock.product_id GROUP BY warehouse_name;
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM product JOIN stock ON product.product_id = stock.product_id;
SELECT view_name, warehouse_name FROM view JOIN warehouse ON view.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category FROM product ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT view_name, product_id, warehouse_id FROM view WHERE product_id = 1 AND warehouse_id = 2;
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(*) AS total_stock FROM stock GROUP BY warehouse_id;
